channel.title: Cache Error
channel.description: I get this when its downloading the cache can anyone help me fix this? [code]java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\.FormationX\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot f ind the file specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:1172) at client.startUp(client.java:9612) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:78) at client.run(client.java:6352) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]

item.title: Cache Error
item.dc:creator: @FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz
item.description:
@FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz wrote:

[quote=“bannedforever, post:2, topic:405797”]i… i realy think your stupid
java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:.FormationX\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find the file specified)[/quote]
Okay it is at the root of my Cache and when its downloading it gets to 98% and says connection error retrying in 5+ seconds. I checked my client.java and it is being downloaded to that file.

Read full topic

item.title: Cache Error
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

The file doesn’t exist among the download/or it’s been renamed. Self explanatory?
